cmp: 而 (and/as well as/but (not)/yet (not)/(shows causal relation)/(shows change of state)/(shows contrast))
mng: to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc, vegetarian diet, study room, building, to give alms (to a monk)

exm.mng: Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio, Qing dynasty book of tales by 蒲松齡|蒲松龄[Pu2 Song1 ling2]
to stop following a vegetarian diet, to break a fast
Eid al-Fitr or Feast of Breaking the Fast, celebrated on the last day of Ramadan
dining hall in a Buddhist temple
food given to Buddhist monks as alms
